cards.title: Bike
cards.description: The Department of Public Service builds and maintains facilities to help those travelling in and around the Columbus area to use bicycles and a green, low cost and healthy means of travel.

cards.title: Walking
cards.description: Columbus has made it a priority to increase the walkability of its neighborhoods.

cards.title: Public Transport
cards.description: Riding around via bus could not be easier via COTA bus riding guides and regulations
